duties_responsibilities.duty: Troubleshoot network and computer hardware/software problems, including Microsoft Office products, email, and Internet connectivity.
Create and maintain user accounts, set up and install computers, install software, and computer peripherals.
Order computers and software, instructional technology equipment, and consumables, and provide oversight of the help desk staff ticketing system and phones.
Track IT inventory assets and act as part of the disaster recovery team.
Perform information risk assessments and assist with developing technical standards and direction.
Meet with customers to determine IT needs, assist with collecting specifications and quotes, and document problems, troubleshooting, and solutions.
Participate in training and professional development sessions and perform other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in applicable field or equivalent combination of education and experience. Preferred: Bachelor's degree in information technology or a closely related field
